channel.title: Posts on gduale's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on gduale's blog

item.title: OpenBSD on a Scaleway VM
item.description: In this article, we will see how to install OpenBSD on a Scaleway VM. First, create an instance (a VM) like usual. You can choose for example: Model: DEV1-S OS: Debian 12 Disk size: 10GB Don’t forget to add your public ssh key to be able to access to the VM via ssh. Now, your VM is up and running! Cool we can eraze it ;) Switch off the VM, go to “Advanced settings” and select “Use rescue image” and save.

item.title: Welcome to my personal blog
item.description: Hello everyone! Welcome to my new blog. We’ll be talking here about tech, open source, Linux, and also *BSD systems (with a preference for OpenBSD, you’ll see). I won’t say more for now; see you in the next article.
